visual_identity.logo_concept: Minimalist envelope icon with subtle lock symbol, conveying privacy and budgeting
visual_identity.color_palette: Privacy-focused blues and greens with trust-building accent colors
visual_identity.typography: Clean, readable system fonts emphasizing clarity and trustworthiness
visual_identity.iconography: Simple, recognizable envelope and financial icons with consistent styling

brand_positioning.value_proposition: All the convenience of modern budgeting without compromising your financial privacy
brand_positioning.differentiation: Zero bank integration by design, true local-first financial control

marketing_messaging.primary_message: Take control of your budget without giving up your privacy
key_benefits: Your data stays on your device
target_audiences: Users frustrated with complex budgeting apps

messaging_principles: Privacy is a right, not a privilege
Your money, your control, your privacy

visual_standards.logo_usage: Primary logo with envelope and privacy elements
visual_standards.color_applications: Trust-building blues for primary elements, green for positive actions
visual_standards.typography_hierarchy: Clear hierarchy emphasizing readability and accessibility
